models.Name: LostItem

Definition.readme:
# Lost Item

This model is used to represent an item that has been reported as lost.

It contains all data and metadata for managing a lost item. 

It also can receive uploaded photos of items and auto classify and tag them.

It publishes a block to search through lost items using an array of features and will return the best fit.
